statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_information;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, material_type FROM supplier_information;
SELECT * FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Company';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM supplier_information WHERE material_type = 'Metal';
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM supplier_information ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, material_type FROM supplier_information WHERE material_type = 'Metal' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' AND material_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT supplier_name, address, phone_number FROM supplier_information WHERE material_type = 'Wood' OR material_type = 'Glass' ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, address, contact_person FROM supplier_information WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, material_type, address, contact_person, phone_number FROM supplier_information WHERE material_type IN ('Metal', 'Plastic') ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, country FROM Suppliers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, price FROM Materials WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, country FROM Suppliers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Supplier%';
SELECT material_name, price FROM Materials ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, country, material_name, price FROM Suppliers JOIN Materials ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Materials.supplier_id WHERE country = 'Germany' AND price < 100;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, material_name, price FROM Suppliers JOIN Materials ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Materials.supplier_id ORDER BY supplier_name, material_name;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT model_name, production_year FROM car_models WHERE production_year > 2010 ORDER BY production_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id > 2 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, material_name FROM suppliers INNER JOIN materials ON suppliers.supplier_id = materials.supplier_id;
SELECT model_name, production_year FROM car_models WHERE production_year < 2010 ORDER BY production_year DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE material_price > 50.00;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT part_name, part_description, material_name FROM car_parts JOIN materials ON car_parts.material_id = materials.material_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC, supplier_location ASC
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location='USA'
SELECT supplier_name, material_name FROM suppliers JOIN materials ON suppliers.supplier_id = materials.material_id
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM orders
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM suppliers JOIN orders ON suppliers.supplier_id = orders.supplier_id GROUP BY suppliers.supplier_id
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM Suppliers WHERE location='New York';
SELECT material_name, price FROM Materials ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, quantity FROM Orders WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE payment_method='Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM Suppliers WHERE location='New York';
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM Suppliers WHERE location='California' AND contact_person='John Doe';
SELECT material_name, quantity, price FROM Materials WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
